containers

Class Hypothesis

  • java.lang.Object
    • containers.Hypothesis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Container

    public class Hypothesis
extends java.lang.Object
implements Container
    The Hypothesis is a draft for future ContrastSet. It has Concept from two different Agent's intensional definitions and Signs and one Agent's Examples. For each couple of Concepts from different Agents, it has their relation as an Agreement.
    Author:
    kemoadrian

        Parameters:
        pc - the Pair to remove.
        Returns:
